items.title: TabReX : Tabular Referenceless eXplainable Evaluation
items.description:

Abstract: Evaluating the quality of tables generated by large language models (LLMs) remains an open challenge: existing metrics either flatten tables into text, ignoring structure, or rely on fixed references that limit generalization. We present TabReX, a ref...
